timeline.bodyText: I think we should improve this Javadoc.
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.message:
Use proper package for @MongoClientName

For now we just deprecate the one annotation and support both

Relates to: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/11568#discussion_r478327219
